Key Arguments: Freedom of speech is a basic human right and essential for critical thinking.
All information, regardless of its nature, is vital for critical thinking and debate.
Debate, even if offensive, is important for community dialogue and cultural change.
Restricting speech by law leads to totalitarianism.
The proposed legislation will drive conversations underground.
Notable Quotes: Freedom of Speech and the ability to hear speech and make up one's own mind about information is a basic Human Right.
A nation in which people are limited by the law as to what can be spoken is a nation which is governed by totalitarianism.
